findings.message:

findings.message:
OptionsContract.calculateOTokens(uint256,OptionsContract.Number) (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1980-2009) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-numeratorVal = (collateralAmt.mul(collateralToEthPrice)).div(strikeToEthPrice) (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1992-1994)
	-numOptions = numeratorVal.mul(10 ** exp).div(denomVal) (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#2005)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
OptionsContract.isSafe(uint256,uint256) (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1923-1956) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rightSideVal = (collateralAmt.mul(collateralToEthPrice)).div(strikeToEthPrice) (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1939-1941)
	-stillSafe = leftSideVal <= rightSideVal.mul(10 ** exp) (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1952)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
OptionsContract.constructor(IERC20,int32,IERC20,int32,int32,uint256,int32,IERC20,uint256,OptionsExchange,address,uint256) (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1180-1230) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp < _expiry,Can't deploy an expired contract) (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1194)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
OptionsContract.hasExpired() (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1476-1478) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp >= expiry) (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1477)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
OptionsContract.isExerciseWindow() (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1468-1471) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- ((block.timestamp >= expiry.sub(windowSize)) && (block.timestamp < expiry)) (../..0x951d51baefb72319d9fbe941e1615938d89abfe2.sol#1469-1470)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
